Title: Raincoat
Writer: Rituparno Ghosh (original dialogue), O. Henry (adapted from the story "Gift of Magi")
Actors: Ajay Devgn, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Annu Kapoor, Mouli Ganguly
Plot: All he wanted was to see her just once. Manu was from a village in the backwoods. Neeru was the girl next door, his lost love.
